QuestData.Title: Firebreak
QuestData.Description: In their efforts to decimate Hyjal, Twilight's Hammer has elementals scouring the earth in the wake of the fire.$B$BThey're pulverizing the soil, rooting around in the ash, digging up any scrap of plantlife that survived and destroying it. It's like they're paving the way for... I don't even want to imagine.$B$BStop them before Hyjal is devoid of life. Kill the lava surgers!
QuestData.CompletionText: If Hyjal is any indication of their plans for the rest of Azeroth, I shudder to think of what will happen if Twilight's Hammer ever gets their way.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $n. There's a chance the forest will recover from this yet.$B$BNow, there's something else I need you to take care of for me...
